wexpman.hookobjects.impl

Class StopAtFirstProcessingHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • wexpman.hookobjects.impl.ExperimentHookBehavior
      • wexpman.hookobjects.impl.StopAtFirstProcessingHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExperimentHook

    public class StopAtFirstProcessingHook
extends ExperimentHookBehavior
    This is a demo hook which will stop the experiment on the first time it is processed
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich
